textAfterTable: Options & Services ThinkStation D30 WorkstationOptions & Services Lenovo Security Cable Lock (57Y4303) The Kensington Security Cable Lock by Lenovo helps reduce theft and manage physical security access wherever you need it. Lightweight (130 g / 0.29 lbs ) design is ideal to carry in a carrying case for extra security when traveling. Easily secure the desktop, dock, port replicator, or flat panel monitor. Lenovo Fingerprint USB Keyboard (73P4730) The ThinkPlus Preferred Pro USB Keyboard with fingerprint reader offers delivers access to confidential files with the swipe of a finger, rather than typing passwords for many applications. With this biometric solution to authentication you can chose to have the convenience of simple fingerprint authentication only, or configure for one of the most secure log-in processes available.
